comment.author: Jaimie
comment.text: My obamacare premium just rose from $502 to $777 ! One of our employees just went from $190 to $373, almost DOUBLE !! Don't vote for Socialist Hillary !

replies.author: Laker
replies.text: So I guess as well n employer you don't provide your employees health insurance?

replies.author: Jaimie
replies.text: Laker we pay 50% of their insurance.

replies.author: Lauren
replies.text: Highly doubt these are ACA policies. 79% of them cost less than $100 with subsidies. Only 12.9 million have them. These are easily fact checked on Kaiser Family website.
